alert.note: Alert for Southern Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 3:22AM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Washington County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The combination of strong winds and the weight of the snow may lead to downed tree branches resulting in some power outages. The snow will start to taper off during this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
